responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Our college(sri venkateswara college of engineering) offers a variety of courses including Engineering, MBA, Science, MCA.
You can apply online through our website. The admission requirements vary for different courses. Please visit our admissions page for more details.

patterns: How can I contact the college?
responses: You can contact us at 123-456-7890 or email us at info@college.edu
